item.description:
Alan M is hosting this event, thanks Alan.

The Granary Tavern, which is located on the Rose Kennedy Greenway across from the Aquarium Rings fountain, opened a few months ago after the historic building underwent major renovation. Evening parking is available at International Place at 55 Purchase Street, across the Greenway from Rowes Wharf and just a couple of blocks from the Granary.

Light appetizers will be provided compliments of the Sitzundjibers Social Club
item.how_to_find_us: We will be hard to miss! Look for the laughter & smiling faces ?;-)
item.name: Come join us for an Afterwork in Boston
